summary: This is a retexture of a few of the armours from asianboy345\'s super TERA Armor Collection UNP.   My intent is to do something similar to the other great armours in the collection and make available if there is any interest.
descriptionHtml:
[img=50x50]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35977-3-1369010510.jpg[/img]

[size=20][b][color=blue]Tera Armour Retexture for UNP[/color][/b][/size]

[url=https://vimeo.com/67972863]TBBS implemented [/url] by forexcorso with UNP body.

[color=Red]Thanks everyone who uploaded an image. Keep them coming![/color]

Version 1.5: added Castanic Hunter and Trielek,  Blade Dancer and Atroscine retextures.
    Note: I had to do some changes to the meshes so if you are loading it manually don\'t forget to load the new meshes.

Version 1.3: added Gildhorn retextures.
Version 1.2: added Royalrite, Voidmeld, and Silver Spellsword retextures.
V1.1: Added retexture of silvergaze.
V1.0: Added retexture of divinesight.

This is a retexture of one of the armours from asianboy345\'s TERA Armor Collection UNP.  You need to first install the TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female by asianboy345 found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846 and DIMONIZED UNP female bodyby dimon99 found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709.  My intent is to do something similar to the others great armours in the collection and make available if there is any interest.

!(https://vimeo.com/67972863)


If you have a CBBE body you can use my mod found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35790/

Upload any photos you take.
----------------

Thank you asianboy345 for permission to do this retexture.

Requirements
========================================================================================
TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP femaleby asianboy345
DIMONIZED UNP female bodyby dimon99
Skyrim v1.8

Credits
========================================================================================
asianboy345 for his great armor mod: TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female
DIMONIZED UNP female bodyby dimon99
En Masse for the meshes
author: CherylOh
